item.title: (Not) interrupting background tasks with Ctrl+C
item.description: When using R interactively from the command line, one can interrupt the current computionation using Ctrl+C key combination and enter a new command. This works both on Unix terminal and on Windows console in Rterm. Such computation may be implemented in R or C and may be executing an external command while waiting for the result e.g.Â via system(,wait=TRUE).
